name: Internet Archive Video Resizer
author: Azizur Rahman

sections.description:
If you use the Twenty Eleven Theme and regularly embed videos from Internet Archive Community Video collections you might like this plugin.

This plugin will resize the video embed code from archive.org to a size that fits nicely within the Twenty Eleven Theme.

Internet Archive embed code normally gives you a 640 x 506 video size which breaks the Twenty Eleven Theme and looks odd with other embedded videos (namely youtube). This plugin will overrides the final embed code to 584 x 461 so it fits nicely into the Twenty Eleven Theme.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the internet-archive-video-resizer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Internet Archive Video Resizer plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy Open Source Movies collections and happy embedding! This plugin has no configuration options.

short_description: This plugin will resize the video embed code from archive.org to a size that fits nicely within the Twenty Eleven Theme.
